name: Banners for product categories
author: WEBPlugins

sections.description:
For showing banners for product categories.
For each product category, two banners can be setted, one for wide screens and one for mobiles (for mobiles is in the premium version).

These banners can be shown in a category template or page with the shortcode [banner-prod-cat-webs].
See a working example on webplugins.nl.

If you have any feedback, issues, or suggestions for improvements please mail to support@webplugins.nl
If you find a bug, please report it and I will solve it very soon.
sections.changelog:
1.6.4 (15 october 2023)

  • ‘pro’ changed to ‘premium’.

1.6.2 (11 october 2023)

  • update to premium version more fluent

1.6.0 (11 october 2023)

  • security improvements

1.0.3 (21 June 2023)

  • No lazy loading; In banners lazy loading is almost always not desirable.

1.0.2 (June 2023)

  • First deployed version
